attributes.background: Cancel Exams For Year 13 Students In January And Summer Exams For A-Level And Btec.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066

Since you started your petition the Government has stated that it is not possible or fair for all exams to go ahead this summer as normal. The Education Secretary will work with Ofqual to put in place alternative arrangements.

You can read the Prime Minister's full statement about new Covid-19 restrictions, including on schools, here: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-address-to-the-nation-4-january-2021
